formattedAddress: 250 W 14th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 250 W 14th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

editorialSummary.text: Time-tested pub serving burgers, sandwiches & bar bites, plus draft beer, cocktails & sangria.

originalText.text:
I came here to play some pinball, the staff is friendly and helpful. There are only two machines but they are in good working order.

The place was quite but with a few groups of people have a good time. I would definitely come back.

text.text:
I came here to play some pinball, the staff is friendly and helpful. There are only two machines but they are in good working order.

The place was quite but with a few groups of people have a good time. I would definitely come back.

originalText.text: You won't find a 2 for 1 happy hour after 12 anywhere else in NYC. Great atmosphere, service and food.

text.text: You won't find a 2 for 1 happy hour after 12 anywhere else in NYC. Great atmosphere, service and food.

originalText.text:
Purchased just food for myself on New Year's Eve. Signed bill and tipped $0, just checked bank statement and total was updated to include a tip. I did not tip. Shocked they would add a tip on my behalf. Unfortunately, have to dispute transaction.
Bar was nice, but again I came strictly for takeout. The food was good though. Just make sure you actually pay for what you are getting!

originalText.text:
DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY IF LESLIE IS THERE

Cool atmosphere..The Happy Hour is a plus...Allowing your customers to choose the music is a plus...BUT Unfortunately, if you're BLACK...you will not be serviced by the bartender LESLIE....I've been coming for weeks after work and any time she is there I get awful service...I'll either wait longer than usual and when I do get serviced I receive watered down drinks compared to the other bartenders...

My friends and I do not get treated like this by the other Bartenders there...As a fellow bartender in the neighborhood her behavior is extremely uncalled for....The other bartenders there are so cool....The atmosphere makes you want to be there but if you get LESLIE.. you're drinks will be watered down plus an attitude!! I'm not sure how the owner or management isn't aware of how this young lady is treating people in that bar...

I  went one night with a male friend and she didnt even bother to take my order..she focused on my friend the entire time we were there..he had to order for me!!

Another night I was getting harassed by a  customer (who LESLIE seems to know) in the bar and instead of kicking him out...I was told I wouldn't be served and I had to leave the bar...AGAIN if you're BLACK don't waste your time going here...we're not wanted and it shows...I would love to speak to the owner because a person like this should not be allowed to service others..it's quite disgusting to see how she treats customers but hey it works for them *shrug*

originalText.text: Really liked this place. Would've stayed longer for the 2 for 1 drinks but couldn't for whatever reason. Staff were all friendly and great selection of drinks. $8 for a pint during happy hour but when it's 2 for 1 that's fine by me
